Reviews.Title: “Initial unpleasant surprise and missfeelings”
Reviews.Author: worldcitizenMadrid
Reviews.Content: I have missfeelings about this hotel. First because it is not a hotel. It is an appartment where you share rooms with others. You share even the bathroom and this bathroom does not appears very clean. Even the stuff for the rooms seems not very clean. The staff is very competent (Thank you Raul for your support) but nobody cleaned our rooms during the three nights we were there. Nobody made our beds,.... But the surrondings are perfect. Very near to everything in Rome. You can walk all the time to the main atractions. With good restaurants and cafes around. My positive suggestion: Use this appartment for a whole family (Occupying the three rooms od the whole appartment) or with friends and forget you are in a hotel and forget about the breakfast. If you want breakfast you wil have to use the kitchen and make it yourself. Considering the above, the solution can be very good. And remember you have to pay cash and in advance. In a nut shell: Missfeelings.

Reviews.Title: “Avoid! Danger!”
Reviews.Author: larrywf
Reviews.Content: We booked this room because it was close to the Vatican, and a very good price. We met Raul, and checked in, and to make a long story short they had bed bugs. We could not sleep even an hour because of the bites and the scratching. We finally went out in the hall at 3 am and noticed a light on in the other room. A young couple from Sweden also had the same problem. We met Raul the next morning and he was very rude and turned very violent. We have never had such a terrible night in the many years we have been visiting Rome. Not only did it ruin the night, we ended up missing the Vatican because we were too tired from the lack of sleep.

Reviews.Title: “Incredible Location!!! but not Clean....”
Reviews.Author: Shelleybeth
Reviews.Content: Stayed here just 1 nite...The Host was a young man, Raul, Very nice, but, doesn't pay to have anyone clean the place, that is my personal observation....He is sitting on a Gold Mine..From our bedroom windows, you can see the Vatican Walls...Great Location!!!!.Why he doesn't paint the dirty scuff marks, did'nt feel comfortable sleeping in the sheets, there was no lock on the bedroom door (when you are in the room at nite). and since you are sharing the apt and bathroom with strangers, you should be able to lock the bedroom door when you are sleeping. Also, our feet were filty from the scum coating baked on the tiled floor..This is a shame, Pay a housecleaner to come in atleast once a week just to keep place kept up....I am just glad we were there for only 1 night....

Reviews.Title: “Nice host, good location but not so well taken cared off”
Reviews.Author: viajerochile21
Reviews.Content: The host/manager was incredible we arrived late and couldnt enter(its an apartment with some rooms as hotel) the manager was waiting for us so that was a good start. The location is very good and has a great coffe room right the corner of the street, great breakfeast, and also the vatican is 3 minutes away so its incredible. Thhe bad things is that the breakfeast that they say they give is none is like a kitchen with some cereal and other things, not worth it, the room and bathrooms are not that well taken cared of.

Reviews.Title: “great location for Vatican Museums”
Reviews.Author: EliIreland
Reviews.Content: this is a good "rent a room in an apartment" choice, we paid 138euro for 2 nights stay for a 3 bed room, only downfall was sharing the bathroom with 2 other rooms, and unfortunately the bathroom was next to our room so we could hear everybodies early morning functions :( there's a lovely cafe on the corner of Santa Maura nearby which does a decent croissant and O.J.

Reviews.Title: “rather musty place”
Reviews.Author: rome2010
Reviews.Content: If you think of a bed and breakfast and you see the foto of de room you might think of a nice place to stay. This was totally not the case. musty room, bad bathroom, rates to high and no breakfast.. we payed 95 euro

Reviews.Title: “Value for money”
Reviews.Author: tr1padv1sor
Reviews.Content: Stayed five nights in the 4 beds room. There is a market down the street and an Internet cafe in the same block. Supermarket is a 8 min walk, as is the Cipro metro station. Easy access to any part of Rome. Albatros is budget, but definitely OK for the travelers who rather spend their money outside of their place to sleep. Place should not be advertised as Bed&Breakfast though, as this raises too many expectations. It's more like a hostel in which you have your own locked room. Room and living room has airconditioning, windows are noise proof.

Reviews.Title: “Just an apartment with rooms to rent”
Reviews.Author: aloewy
Reviews.Content: Although it is a stone's throw from the Vatican, this room really wasn't good for the money. The furniture was dated and very worn. We shared the apartment with a family and the children came and tried to open our bedroom door when we were sleeping. Very little privacy and one shared bathroom. It is NOT a typical B&B, although there is a shared kitchen with tea and coffee and biscuits. The young man who checked us in was very helpful.

HotelInfo.Name: Albatros Vittoria Vaticano
HotelInfo.Address: Via La Goletta 19, 00192 Rome, Italy
